website_summaries.verdict: This stand-up shoe shiner gets the job done in a hurry, so you'll be looking great in no time.
pros: Buffers made of Australian lamb's wool
Push-button controls at top for convenience in shining and stability
cons: Motor is not extremely powerful, but the machine is intended for light buffing, which does not require too much pressure
Polishing with a heavy-duty motor could damage your shoes

customer_reviews.title: didin't work, don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1 star is being generous. The product came out of the box put together with the exception of the buffing pads. No issues there. I plugged it into a power converter and it didn't work. There was no sound of anything even trying to work. ***Update*** I tried contacting the company. Over the span of the past 3-4 weeks I received 2 very short 1 sentence emails/questions about if I did something and then nothing. I definitely don't recommend this product. It hasn't come close to what they said it could do (never even worked out of the box) and their customer service follow through when contacted is horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe polisher.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe polisher. Easy and quick to use; it only takes seconds to polish the shoe. For those who say the motor is weak, they are using it wrong. It is a shoe polisher and not a shoe sander so don’t jam the shoe in there like it is a sander; just hold the shoe such that it gets polished to a nice finish all around. I use it everyday and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe shine machine. I used to have one just like that from Sharper Image but was made cheaply and it broke in couple of months. This one appears to be made very well so I hope it will last me a long time. I do shine my shoes daily and reliability is important for me. The motor is also very quiet spinning very smoothly. I definitely recommend this shoe shine machine to every men and women who owns leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DPFAST

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Good no-frills shoe polisher for the price. Sure the motor isn't powerful, but you are shining shoes not grinding steel bolts. Keep the pressure light so that it spins fast and it will get a nice shine. Been using mine for almost a year now and it still performs the same. Though without decent instructions I never was able to figure out the difference between the red and black pads. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shine my shoes a couple times a week with this great gizmo. Makes it very easy to keep your shoes looking great between polishing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy review
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, not hard to put on buffers. Comes with two buffer rollers and tool to put them on. Good instructions. Motors have plenty of power. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Seals

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my husband's favorite gifts EVER!!!! Even my kids love it and I'm looking forward to using this winter on my boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I.

customer_reviews.title: Trying to find a way to stay on
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I wish it had a button that stays on to buff the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Crook

customer_reviews.title: works but is underpowered.
customer_reviews.text: This buffer works and does a good job but you have to be careful. If you apply even a little bit of pressure, it stalls. For $109, it should have a better motor.
customer_reviews.author: GP Photo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, a bit heavy but seams well built. The machine does an excellent job buffing my shoes! Having well polished shoes is important for a professional look at work and this machine makes it easy and fast. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: So very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with this purchase! Have wanted one since I was a child, though considered it a luxury expense. What better way to spend an Amazon Gift Card for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Shining
customer_reviews.text: Nice buffer. Very smooth power, no vibrating about the floor. Keep'em shinny.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: If you are a man who has his shoes polished frequently or....if you are looking for a gift for your someone special, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A. Krietz

customer_reviews.title: Makes shoe shining easy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! It makes shining his shoes so much easier. My dad had one of these when I was growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Shamrock

customer_reviews.title: Rookiejohn
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I just wish it had a little more power. Still a good machine
customer_reviews.author: Rookiejohn

customer_reviews.title: A-OK
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. The motor is plenty strong, and only will stop if you apply a decent amount of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great product
customer_reviews.text: Definitly worth the money. I have it in the office and it gets lots of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Dynamic Rollover

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He loves the ease of using the polisher and likes the results on his dress shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken wire.
customer_reviews.text: I had to splice wire to get it to work. Should not have to pay 100+ for damaged goods
customer_reviews.author: James C. Styer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKING VERY WELL, GETTING A LOT OF USE AT POLICE STATION
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made. I don’t know how I got by without one of these. Use this everyday before stepping out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and I love how fast and easy it is to get my ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and I love how fast and easy it is to get my boots shined. This product was also ready to use right out of the box. Just plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for your shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he uses it everyday! He loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fortson

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe polisher/buffer. Easy to put together, very quiet and very sturdy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, and takes the chore out of polishing your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DHEvans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and a time saver when you get comfortable with it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good buffer, I've always seen them for years and wanted to get one. It works well with the polish on your shoes, but it's even better if you add a coating to it then buff!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: EVEN IF YOU AREN'T BUFFED, YOUR SHOES WILL BE
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it was designed to do. Who could ask for more? Plus it makes cleaning up your shoe tops dead easy.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Healey

customer_reviews.title: Shine Away
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. I had read a few reviews that stated that the motor would stop if too much pressure was applied to the buffers. I have NOT found that to be true. I have shined a closet full of shoes and have never had an issue. Great item for at home or in the office.
customer_reviews.author: TMcCann

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought it used too.
customer_reviews.text: It really makes the shoes/boots look good quickly with little effort on my part
customer_reviews.author: thetroz

customer_reviews.title: Make Those Shoes Shine!
customer_reviews.text: Easy Assembly. I use it every day I wear my dress shoes. It adds that final touch.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah George

customer_reviews.title: I've had these before and this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I took this to the office and put it in the breakroom where it gets a lot of use. I've had these before and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Police Department and it seems to be doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... to my husband as a gift and he's very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as a gift and he's very happy with it. Says it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it! Works great! All of my co workers love using it!
customer_reviews.author: nieves colorado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Choke Down Like the Conair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Conair. I never was happy with the Conair, but put up with it. The Conair would stop with anything more than very light pressure, and its pads would not stay on dependably. This new one is impressive by comparison. I can now apply reasonable pressure without it choking down, and the pads seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: tonymcc

customer_reviews.title: 8 SHERIFFS SUBSTATIONS USE THESE AND THEY ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT, IM A DEPUTY SHERIFF AND I POLISH THIS BUFF IT WITH THIS AND ITS GREAT. EACH OF OUR 8 SUBSTATIONS HAVE THESE AND THEY ARE STILL WORKING GREAT AFTER 3 YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: Deputy Pink

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Has plenty of power for normal shoe shine pressure and enough weight to keep it in position on the floor. Exactly what I was looking for at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: A great polisher...but maybe not for someone who needs to use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these kind of shoe polishers in hotels, and they always seemed like a good idea. There is another model on the market that is much more expensive and looks like it's top of the line quality. But unless you need to use a shoe polisher every day, this quality of this model is perfect. It's very convenient to have it in my closet, ready to use on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: De Anna

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. It was Just what he wanted for his birthday gift this year
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic buffing cones break easily, I have to replace one already.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Works well, shines shoes very well
customer_reviews.text: I like that these shine my shoes very well in a short amount of time. The button can be a little difficult because pressing it doesn't always start the machine. You may have to push it hard, but when it works it is great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rabie

customer_reviews.title: Shoe shine
customer_reviews.text: I could have saved hours if I bought one of these months ago. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not very heavy, and lots of plastic components on it.. Hope it lasts a long time. Beats hand buffing & bending.
customer_reviews.author: GOOZIEMOM

customer_reviews.title: It replaced one just like it that lasted over 25 years
customer_reviews.text: We use this at work, everyone loves it. It replaced one just like it that lasted over 25 years.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and the speed is consistent and very fast spinning. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Squabie

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Shine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at work. Similar to one that we had previously. Could use a little more power but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: ThreeStars Buff Shine Electric Shoe Polishing Machine
customer_reviews.text: I run an Air Force Junior ROTC unit. Every week they have a uniform inspection. This machine makes them more cognizant of having shined shoes, so they make great use of the polisher. Works real well and the inspection scores have improved.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest R. Veranes

customer_reviews.title: Delivered ontime.  Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some say not enough power. It has plenty of power for my needs and exceeds my expectations. The only thing that I would have liked better for a five star rating is an on off switch instead of the button at the top of the pole which has to be held down while you polish. This makes it hard if you wish to polish by hand.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. Works great and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great my husband uses it often for a quick polish.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: electric shine shoe polishing
customer_reviews.text: this is prefect, it works super, I can do it avery day in just 5 minutes! I can put it where ever i want and it doent take to much space
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: My shoes always look good now.
customer_reviews.text: I find this buffer well made and does not stall in normal use even with some extra pressure. I leave it plugged in by the front door and buff my shoes when I leave. My shoes always look good now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied guy!
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a christmas gift for my husband. he absolutely loves it. very satisfied guy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora VanMeter

customer_reviews.title: still works great; this one is for my son who also ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had one for 20+ years; still works great; this one is for my son who also takes pride in how his shoes look.

customer_reviews.title: This works great for a detailed polishing or a quick buff in ...
customer_reviews.text: Always waned once since I first used it in a hotel. This works great for a detailed polishing or a quick buff in the morning. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Figurative1

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The black buff ejected from the lever and it has never stayed fixed to the buffer
customer_reviews.author: Igbelokotor Onoabhagbe

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money/
customer_reviews.text: Barely has enough torque to work. It works if you use a very, very light pressure but that is not how it should be, Save your money and get the one Made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecks in 3D

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe shine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good machine. It could use a stronger motor but I'm thrilled with the performance and the price. I'd recommend it to a friend or coworker.

customer_reviews.title: Got this from my wife for my birthday & love it. I use it a lot & it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this from my wife for my birthday & love it. I use it a lot & it does a great job

customer_reviews.title: Love It and so do my shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and was shipped super fast. My shoes love it and it takes the work out of keeping them shining

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and item was as described. Thanks for a great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Shine up as you leave the house or office.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Bizanis

customer_reviews.title: I've had one that my wife gave to me as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had one that my wife gave to me as a gift.... I wore it out! We'll just have to wait and see, with this one!
customer_reviews.author: P. DONAHUE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Will do the job. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Poalivas

customer_reviews.title: "Moneysworth" is Definitely Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this polisher together and plugged it in and pressed the button on the top to turn it on and it came on. Then I pressed it again and it clicked and it no longer comes on. This was a complete waste of money. I didn't realize that you had 30 days to try it out. So please do not buy this shoe polisher because it is absolutely worthless and I'm out of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Doris V. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Way too under-powered. I checked the rating tag and it is only 95 watts. Hardly enough to light a bright light bulb. The motor drags down considerably with the slightest pressure on the pads.
customer_reviews.author: bernie k digman

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE MY FATHER USED TO SAY WOMAN JUDGE MEN BY ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE MY FATHER USED TO SAY WOMAN JUDGE MEN BY THERE SHOES NOT THERE WALLET SO KEEPS YOURS SHINED WITH THIS EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Moneysworth & Best Buff Shine Electric Shoe Polishing Machine
product_meta.description: An electric shoe polishing machine with push button control. Get a magnificent buff in just seconds with the top of the line buffers. Great for home and the office.
feature_bullets: Buffs a magnificent shine in seconds, Buffers imported made with Australian lambs wool
Push-button control for convenience and stability
Outperforms other brands shoe shine machines
110V machine for North America (Adapter or transformer not recommended)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
